mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_login_ip, u.last_login_time, u.user_avatar, u.user_sex, u.user_mobile, u.user_status, u.dept_id, u.user_password, t.tenant_id, t.tenant_name, t.tenant_status, d.dept_name, p.post_name, p.post_id FROM ( cpms_system_user u, cpms_system_tenant t) LEFT JOIN cpms_system_dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id LEFT JOIN cpms_system_post p ON u.post_id = p.post_id WHERE u.user_account = #{userAccount} AND u.tenant_id= t.tenant_id AND u.del_flag = 0 AND t.del_flag = 0
